name: SYNETY
tag_list: communications, call-recording, cloud, telephony, telecoms, process-based-communications
overview:
SYNETY is a software as a service company, developing, delivering and supporting cloud business telecoms capabilities.

Its solutions include CloudCall Click, which works with customers’ existing business phone systems, or with the included CloudCall Communicator soft phone as a standalone system. Priced at £10 per user, per month, it enables process-based communications functions such as click-to-dial from email clients such as MS Outlook and Gmail, as well as a growing range of CRM, sales suites and business software.

All calls can be recorded in the cloud, and call recordings managed and used in email clients or other software as easily as a Word document. It also creates a complete log of all inbound and outbound calls made using the service.

CloudCall Enterprise operates as a stand-alone hosted PABX service over a broadband connection, using either SYNETY VoIP handsets or SYNETY’s softphone. It can be provisioned within a few minutes and installed, configured and running in two working days.

Additional built-in functions include advanced reporting and analysis on usage and activity by user; integrated IVR / Auto-Receptionist; and call queuing.

The CloudCall API web service allows organisations to create bespoke, scalable voice applications that run from the Cloud and within current CRM or business software.

SYNETY’s pay-as-you-use pricing model cuts costs and enables companies to react quickly to changing demands, without the need for dedicated servers or networks, and with no need for in-house telecoms expertise. The company is part of SYNETY Group plc (SNTY: LSE), formerly Zenergy Power plc.
